clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluating the Clinical Efficacy and Safety of Colflex
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluating the Clinical Efficacy and Safety of Colfelx

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to test the safety and efficacy of Colflex, an oral spray created by Innotech Nutrition, on human subjects to measure changes on frequency/duration of colds and sore throats, as well as dental and oral health changes.

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency and duration of colds/sore throats
primary_outcome.description: Using a self-reported scale to assess the frequency and during of colds and sore throats at screening, and at baseline and endpoint of treatments

secondary_outcome.description: A mouth swab will be taken to measure pathogenic bacteria (Straph, Strep), and a mouth swab will be used for the BANA test to test for periodontal disease causing bacteria.

other_outcome.measure: Effect on plasma lipid profile and enzyme measurements
other_outcome.description: Exploratory efficacy measures include lipid profile, (TC, HDL, TG), and liver enzymes
A breath sample is taken to measure volatile sulphur compounds using a halimeter.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- availability to give written consent
- age 18-60, men and women (who are not pregnant or nursing)
- people in good health
- able to follow protocol
- must be experiencing a sore throat or cold at least once a year
Exclusion Criteria:
- smokers
- liver and kidney disease
- inflammatory bowel disease
- pancreatitis
- gallbladder or biliary disease
- neurolgical/psychological disease
- bleeding disorders
- platelet abnormatilies
- gastrointestinal disorders that could interfere with fat absorption
- serum triglycerides > 500 mg/dL and/or total cholesterol > 300 mg/dL
- hypertension (systolic blood pressure >160 mm Hg or diastolic blood pressure > 100 Hg
- BMI >30
- consume or planned to consume anticoagulant, hypertension, or lipid lowering medications
- reported consumption of more than 2 alcoholic drinks/day or history of alcoholism or drug dependence
- reported use of experimental medication within 1 month prior to the trial

responsible_party.investigator_title: Director of the Richardson Centre for Functional Foods and Nutraceuticals
